You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gcirc;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Gcirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/011c/index.htm U+0011C].
  * `&gcirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/011d/index.htm U+0011D].
